document_data.name: Nereid
document_data.mainbody: The '''Nereid language''' was the racial language of [[nereid]]s, a type of aquatic [[fey]].
document_data.Speakers: Beyond nereids themselves, Nereid was a common secondary language among the [[pahari]] of [[Zakhara]],<ref>{{Cite dragon/250/Heroes of the Sea|32}} some [[planeswalker]]s,<ref> and the [[specialty priest]]s of gods that held dominion over water. the [[waterwalker]]s of [[Istishia]], and the [[waveservant]]s of [[Umberlee]].
document_data.Notable Speakers: * [[Nimtu]], one of a pair of [[human]]s who owned [[The Painted Boat]] restaurant, learned to speak a smattering of the Nereid language after befriending the nereid [[Anemone (nereid)|Anemone]].<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/79/The Living City: The Painted Boat Restaurant|18}}
